mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO ,MEMBER_EMAIL ,MEMBER_PASSWORD ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,MEMBER_NAME ,MEMBER_PHONE ,member_auth ,member_status FROM member WHERE member_email = #{ email }

select od.order_no ,od.port_no ,od.request_con ,od.request_status ,od.order_final ,op.option_no ,op.option_dt ,op.option_fix ,op.option_price ,req.file_no ,req.file_path ,req.file_name ,gd.g_file_no ,gd.g_file_path ,gd.g_file_name from orders od join port_option op on od.option_no = op.option_no left join request_file req on od.order_no = req.order_no left join guide_file gd on od.order_no = gd.order_no where od.order_no = #{ order_no };

select order_no ,port_title ,member_nickname ,order_dt ,order_finaldt ,option_price ,request_status from ( select od.order_no ,od.member_no ,por.port_title ,od.order_dt ,od.order_finaldt ,op.option_price ,od.request_status from(select * from orders where port_no = '1_p') as od join port_option op on od.option_no = op.option_no join portfolio por on por.port_no = od.port_no ) as a join member m on m.member_no = a.member_no order by order_no DESC LIMIT #{ startRow }, #{ limit };

select order_no ,port_title ,member_nickname ,order_dt ,order_finaldt ,option_price ,request_status from ( select od.order_no ,por.port_title ,por.member_no ,od.order_dt ,od.order_finaldt ,op.option_price ,od.request_status from( select * from orders where member_no = (select member_no from member where member_email = #{ searchValue }) ) as od join port_option op on od.option_no = op.option_no join portfolio por on por.port_no = od.port_no ) as a join member m on a.member_no = m.member_no order by order_no DESC LIMIT #{ startRow }, #{ limit };
